T08D4147:244b-1: sapta ku m'a r'i ka aa ba d'a nam /
T08D4147:244b-3: gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod pa /
T08D4147:244b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T08D4147:244b-5: chags bral ldan dang legs par bshad pa dang //
T08D4147:244b-6: ngo mtshar dang ni de nyid don nges dang //
T08D4147:244b-7: dam pa rnams kyi gcig tu mnyan bya yi //
T08D4147:244b-8: rtogs pa brjod pa bdag gis bshad kyis nyon //
T08D4147:244b-9: 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams la ni //
T08D4147:244b-11: lang tshos bar du gcod par mi 'gyur bas mdzes par gyur pa yin no //
T08D4147:244b-12: de yang 'di ltar rjes su thos te /
T08D4147:244b-13: rgyal po kri k'i zhes bya ba tshul dang du
T08D4147:244b-14: la ba la sogs pa yon tan gyi dpal phun
T08D4147:244b-15: sum tshogs ba dang ldan pa /
T08D4147:244b-16: bcom ldan 'das yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T08D4147:244b-17: 'od srungs la dad pa yang dag par thob pa
T08D4147:244b-18: zhig byung bar gyur pa de /
T08D4147:244b-19: de'i bu mo bdun sngon du byung pa'i sangs rgyas
T08D4147:244b-20: rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskrun pa'i
T08D4147:244b-21: stobs dang ldan pa de dag 'khor bas shin tu
T08D4147:244b-23: de rnams kyis dul ba dang zhe sar bcas pas
T08D4147:244b-24: pha la phyag byas te snyan pa'i tshig gis smras
T08D4147:244b-25: pa / 'jig rten gnas pa chu nang song ba'i zla ba'i gzugs bzhin g-yo bar mthong //
T08D4147:244b-26: 'dod pa khros pa'i sprul gyis lus skyil gdengs ka'i grib ma lta bur mthong //
T08D4147:244b-27: 'gro ba 'di dag sdug bsngal me yis kun du 'bar ba mthong bas na //
T08D4147:244b-28: rgyal po bdag cag nges par 'byung la mngon dga' dur khrod dag tu mchi //
T08D4147:244b-30: khyed ni byis pa bde la brten 'os shing //
T08D4147:244b-31: yid la bsams pa'i don yang ma byas na //
T08D4147:244b-32: dka' thub gnas su khyed rnams song shig ces //
T08D4147:244b-33: ji lta bur nang yis smra bar nus //
T08D4147:244b-35: sa bdag khyed kyi mdzad spyod bdag cag rnams kyis 'tshal lags te //
T08D4147:244b-36: 'gro la thugs rjes brlan zhing des pa'i ngang tshul ldan bas na //
T08D4147:244b-37: dgos pa med la'ang byams par mdzad na nyid kyi phang par ni //
T08D4147:245a-0: rnam bskyed sdig med nyer son bdag @245a * //
T08D4147:245a-2: khyed dang lhan cig gnas kyang dbang med bral ba mngon phyogs pa'i //
T08D4147:245a-3: phongs pa 'di yis phyir zhing nye bar gdung bar ma gyur ces //
T08D4147:245a-4: rgyal po shin tu dga' ba'i gnas su gyur pa gang dag yin pa yi //
T08D4147:245a-5: zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'tshal ba'i yid ni skyes par gyur //
T08D4147:245a-6: de nas rgyal po de snying brtse ba'i dbang gis yid rnam par nyams shing /
T08D4147:245a-7: mig gnyis zangs ltar dmar la mi 'gyur bas yang dang yang du bltas nas smras pa /
T08D4147:245a-8: ci phyir khang bzangs rang dgar gyur dang 'jam yangs pa'i //
T08D4147:245a-9: sna tshogs stan bzangs rgya chen rnam par spangs nas ni //
T08D4147:245a-10: dur khrod mi bzad skye bo ngan pa'i yid 'dra zhing //
T08D4147:245a-11: sa gzhi rus pa dkar po'i tshal pas bkram pas stan //
T08D4147:245a-12: gdung ba'i gdong can pha dang yul rmugs lta bur ni //
T08D4147:245a-13: mchi ma'i gdong can ma yang cig car ji ltar 'dor //
T08D4147:245a-14: g-yo med sems kyi rgyun du yid ni brtse ba yi //
T08D4147:245a-15: mdza' bshes spangs nas ci phyir dka' thub bstan par dga' //
T08D4147:245a-16: de nas bu mo de rnams kyis shin tu brtan pa'i yid kyis bsnyems par byas nas /
T08D4147:245a-18: pha dang ma dang mdza' bshes gces pa tha snyad tsam //
T08D4147:245a-19: 'di dag srid par phyir yang lhung dang gnod pa'i gzhi //
T08D4147:245a-20: 'byung ba'i don mthong lkog tu gyur pa'i dri ma yis //
T08D4147:245a-21: mi yi bdag po 'jig rten 'jig pas yongs su skyo //
T08D4147:245a-22: mdza' bshes rang mi gnyen gyi ngo bo sna tshogs pa //
T08D4147:245a-23: g-yon can phung khrol ldan pa 'di la su zhig chags //
T08D4147:245a-24: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten mi lam mig 'phrul dang 'dra la //
T08D4147:245a-25: 'di na su zhig gang gis rang mi'am skye bor
T08D4147:245a-26: brtag / mi yi dbang po 'jig rten dam chos
T08D4147:245a-27: gsung gi 'od zer snang bcas shing //
T08D4147:245a-28: ji srid sangs rgyas nyi ma'i yid 'ong grags pa'i 'od zer phreng yod pa //
T08D4147:245a-29: de srid phongs pa'i mun nag tshogs kyis shin tu g-yogs gyur pa'i //
T08D4147:245a-30: srid pa'i mun pa mi zad mun rum nas ni 'byung bar bya ba'i rigs //
T08D4147:245a-31: ji ltar rlung gis brdabs pas bskyod pa'i me lce 'bar ba'i khyim las ni //
T08D4147:245a-32: 'byung bar byed pa'i skyes bu de la phan par 'dod rnams zlog mi byed //
T08D4147:245a-33: de bzhin sdug bsngal me chen rtser gnas srid pa ma lus gnod pa yi //
T08D4147:245b-0: dra ba las ni nges par 'byung la phan phyir @245b dam pas bzlog mi bya //
T08D4147:245b-1: de nas rgyal po des bu mo de rnams mdza'
T08D4147:245b-2: bshes dang rang mi dang rtsa lag rnams la ltos
T08D4147:245b-3: pa med pa'i tshig rtsub po dang /
T08D4147:245b-4: rang gi lus dang srog la yang shin tu ma
T08D4147:245b-5: chags pa'i tshig gis lhag par yang mya ngan gyis
T08D4147:245b-6: gdungs par gyur ba'i yid kyis de rnams la yang
T08D4147:245b-7: smras pa / dus min dka' thub mngon par 'dod pa ni //
T08D4147:245b-8: yid dang rjes mthun don du mi 'gyur te //
T08D4147:245b-9: bu mo dus min mngal dang ldan pa la //
T08D4147:245b-10: yan lag cha shas mdzes pa mi skye bzhin //
T08D4147:245b-11: dus la bab par dka' thub la sbyor ba //
T08D4147:245b-12: zla ba skyon dang bral ba lta bur mdzes //
T08D4147:245b-13: de bas gzhon nus phan med blo 'gyur 'di'i //
T08D4147:245b-14: log pa'i lam du 'jug las bzlog par gyis //
T08D4147:245b-15: bde la brten zhing sdug bsngal ma mthong bas //
T08D4147:245b-16: lus kyis sdug bsngal bzod par mi 'gyur te //
T08D4147:245b-17: aa mra'i shing ni rtsa ba ma zug la //
T08D4147:245b-18: glang chen mchog gi mche ba bsnun dang mtshungs //
T08D4147:245b-19: khong nas me 'bar ltas ngan sgra 'byin pa'i //
T08D4147:245b-20: ce spyang 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs tshang tshing gang //
T08D4147:245b-21: 'jigs pa rnams kyang 'jigs par byed pa yi //
T08D4147:245b-22: mi bzad dur khrod dag ni 'jigs par bcas //
T08D4147:245b-23: khyed lus padma'i rtsa ltar 'jam pa la //
T08D4147:245b-24: sems gang sog les lta bur brtse med 'dis //
T08D4147:245b-25: gzhan gyi ngor byed pa ni spangs gyur pa //
T08D4147:245b-26: ae ma ho gnam bskos bdag la brtse med sdang //
T08D4147:245b-27: bee d'urya ltar sngo ljang ngur pa'i gos gyon cing //
T08D4147:245b-28: me tog rnam pa du ma'i tshogs ni bkram gyur dang //
T08D4147:245b-29: bung ba myos pa'i tshogs kyis khyab pa'i rtsed mo'i tshal //
T08D4147:245b-30: 'dir ni bu mo khyed rnams mngon par dga' bar gyis //
T08D4147:245b-31: skyed mos tshal na rdzing khang ngogs na me tog shing 'phyang zhing //
T08D4147:245b-32: rlung gis skyod pa'i chu rlabs mdzes pa'i phreng pa ska rags bcings /
T08D4147:245b-33: padma dag dang autpa la rgyas gseb dang pa sgra sgrogs pa //
T08D4147:245b-34: brgya byin gyis kyang rnyed dka' bu mo dga' bas gnas par gyis //
T08D4147:245b-35: me tog na pa ma li ka yi dris bsgos gyur pa yi //
T08D4147:245b-36: chu rlabs mdzes par gyur pa'i nye bar g-yo ba yi //
T08D4147:245b-37: rlung dang bcas pa'i khyim 'di dang ni nags tshal ni //
T08D4147:245b-38: khu byug sgra 'byin pa yi bu mo dga' bar gyis //
T08D4147:246a-0: skar khung dra ba can nang bya rnams skad 'byin me tog dris @246a * //
T08D4147:246a-2: sgeg pas khrus byas dri zhim bsgos pa'i nags dang 'dra ba'i rlung dag ni //
T08D4147:246a-3: khang bzangs mda' yab can dang bya gag bde bar nyal ba gang yin 'dir //
T08D4147:246a-4: bud med 'dus pa'i glu dbyangs rol mo ldan par khyed rnams dga' bar gyis //
T08D4147:246a-5: de nas gzhon nu ma rnams pha'i tshig des yi ma rangs par gyur nas smras pa //
T08D4147:246a-6: mi yi bdag po lha yul sa steng na //
T08D4147:246a-7: brgya phrag stong du spyad pa ma byas pa'i //
T08D4147:246a-8: bde ba gzhan dag ci yang yod min te //
T08D4147:246a-9: bdag cag rnams ni don med mkhas pa yin //
T08D4147:246a-10: yul la lhag par sred cing goms pas na //
T08D4147:246a-11: dbang po rnams ni yul gyis ngoms pa med //
T08D4147:246a-12: srid pas 'jigs pa'i rtog pa'i blo can dag /
T08D4147:246a-13: srid pa'i longs spyad zad par bya phyir 'jug /
T08D4147:246a-14: ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur zhing mi brtan la //
T08D4147:246a-15: rlung gis bskyod pa'i chu rlabs ltar 'jigs pas //
T08D4147:246a-16: sdom can dbang po drug las rnam rgyal rnams //
T08D4147:246a-17: phyir zhing srid par 'jug las ldog par byed //
T08D4147:246a-18: byis pa srid pa'i btson rar phag lta bur //
T08D4147:246a-19: sems kyi spags pa'i spyod pas bslus gyur te //
T08D4147:246a-20: bde bar mngon par rlom zhing brkam pa dag / phongs shing 'jigs pa'i g-yang sa mtha' med lhung //
T08D4147:246a-21: bdag tu rtog pas sems g-yengs skyes gyur pa //
T08D4147:246a-23: yul la rjes su brten pas sems bcom pa //
T08D4147:246a-24: yongs su smin na sdug bsngal mi bzang rgyu //
T08D4147:246a-25: 'gro ba 'di dag mi brtan dbang med cing //
T08D4147:246a-26: sbrul gdug mtshon gyis zin 'dra'i yul rnams dag / rtogs kyang gang zhig srid la chags gyur pa //
T08D4147:246a-27: de ni mi yi gzugs ldan phyugs nyid yin //
T08D4147:246a-28: rnga rtsed shing la thogs pa'i g-yag bzhin du //
T08D4147:246a-29: blo yi lam ni rnyog pas nyer 'gags shing //
T08D4147:246a-30: log par chags pa'i yal gas sems thogs pa'i //
T08D4147:246a-31: skyes bu ngan pa'i khyim rten phung bar 'gyur //
T08D4147:246a-32: dga' ba'i rgyu tsam 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten la //
T08D4147:246a-33: phongs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung 'gyur na //
T08D4147:246a-34: yab cig srid pa'i dga' ba mang po las //
T08D4147:246a-35: slu bar mi 'gyur gang zhig mchis par gsungs //
T08D4147:246b-0: mi dbang srid na skal ba mnyam @246b pa yis //
T08D4147:246b-1: nye bar bsgrubs shing bsags par gyur kyang ni //
T08D4147:246b-2: bcom zhing sems ni dman pa dman pa yis //
T08D4147:246b-3: srid pa'i dgon pa gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur //
T08D4147:246b-4: rgyal po rgyar chud gyur pa'i nya bzhin du //
T08D4147:246b-5: skyes bu legs par brtags shing byed pa dang //
T08D4147:246b-6: tha snyad kun la ngang gis mkhas pa yang //
T08D4147:246b-7: khyim gyi btson rar gnas na 'jig par 'gyur //
T08D4147:246b-8: sa yi bdag po 'bad pa mang po yis //
T08D4147:246b-9: khyim du rdzas rnams bsags pa byas ba dag / mi yis skad cig gis ni 'dor 'gyur te //
T08D4147:246b-10: legs bshad gcig pu 'di nyid lam du bstan //
T08D4147:246b-11: de bas 'jig rten mgon pos 'tsho ba yi //
T08D4147:246b-12: 'jig rten mi rnams las bdag byar gsungs te //
T08D4147:246b-13: 'chi ba mngon phyogs mi la rang gi las //
T08D4147:246b-14: ba la be'u bzhin du rjes su 'brangs //
T08D4147:246b-15: yongs su gyur na mi bzad gnyen sdug dang //
T08D4147:246b-16: sdug dang 'dre bar mngon pas 'dod des chog /
T08D4147:246b-17: sdug dang phrad pas dga' bar sems bdag / nges
T08D4147:246b-18: par sdug dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'thob //
T08D4147:246b-19: mi dbang gzhan yang ngang gis mthar 'jig pa'i //
T08D4147:246b-20: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten dag na sdug pa su //
T08D4147:246b-21: dam pa'i don la rnam dpyod mkhas pa yang //
T08D4147:246b-22: sdug ces bya ba 'dis blo rnam par g-yengs //
T08D4147:246b-23: sa bdag khyed ni gal te bdag cag la //
T08D4147:246b-24: sdug pa 'ga' zhig mchis na bdag cag rnams //
T08D4147:246b-25: ma smad 'phags pas bsten zhing mi phrogs pa'i //
T08D4147:246b-26: bde ba yid la 'dod pa sgrub tu gsol //
T08D4147:246b-27: de nas rgyal po de brtse ba'i yi ma rangs phar gyur kyang /
T08D4147:246b-28: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mngon par dad
T08D4147:246b-29: pas chos la bar chad byed pa'i 'jigs pa skyes
T08D4147:246b-30: pa dang // rang gi bu mo rnams kyis sngon
T08D4147:246b-31: gyi skye ba rjes su dran te 'gro bar 'dod
T08D4147:246b-32: pas na skye ba dran pas nyes so snyam du
T08D4147:246b-33: bsams te shin tu yun ring por cang mi smra
T08D4147:246b-34: pa dang // bar gyur to // mi yi skyes bu de yis ni //
T08D4147:246b-35: 'chi ba med par shes pas na //
T08D4147:246b-36: song bas yongs su ma spangs par //
T08D4147:246b-37: ci zhig ltar ni rjes snang smras /
T08D4147:246b-38: de nas bu mo de rnams kyis me tog phreng ba dang byug pa dang rgyan rnams spangs nas /
T08D4147:247a-0: dul ba dang ldan par zhugs pa'i lus la gos dkar @247a * //
T08D4147:247a-1: po phra zhing rab tu 'phyang ba gyon bas chu
T08D4147:247a-2: bo rlung gi shugs gyis bskyod pa'i dbu ba'i phreng
T08D4147:247a-3: ba lta bu'am // ston ka'i mtshan mo zla ba'i 'od kyis gos kyis bkab pa lta bu'am /
T08D4147:247a-4: drang srong sme bdun gyi skar ma rang gi 'od zer gyi dra bas g-yogs pa lta bu dang /
T08D4147:247a-5: rim gyis ro bsreg pa'i gnas me'i dbus su ro
T08D4147:247a-6: bzhag pa cil cil zer ba rnam par bkram pa
T08D4147:247a-7: dang / ro rnam par mnam pa dri mi zhim cing 'jigs su rung ba dang /
T08D4147:247a-8: mi'i thod pa bya rgod kyis mchu'i rtse mo rnon
T08D4147:247a-9: pos brdol ba'i bu ga nas glad pa dang chu
T08D4147:247a-10: ser rnam par 'jigs pas mi ro'i gdong la spags
T08D4147:247a-11: pas mtha' ma khyab cing 'jigs pa dang /
T08D4147:247a-12: rnyings shing dengs la mdog rnam par 'gyur ba'i rus
T08D4147:247a-13: pa dum bu'i tshogs kyis non cing rtsub pas sa'i
T08D4147:247a-14: phyogs rnams bgrod par dka' ba dang /
T08D4147:247a-15: lus can dag yongs su yid 'byung bar byed pa
T08D4147:247a-16: gshin rje'i gnas bzhin mya ngan dang yid mi bde
T08D4147:247a-17: ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i dur khrod du phyin par gyur to //
T08D4147:247a-18: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
T08D4147:247a-19: mi yi khrag dang zhag gis dri mi zhim pas myos bar gyur pa'i bya rgod dang /
T08D4147:247a-20: rgyu lto nar bas khyab cing mi sdug 'jigs pa'i ngo yi yan lag rnams kyis khebs //
T08D4147:247a-21: kun da 'dra bar dkar zhing rtag tu dgod pa 'dra bar mtha' gas thod pa dang //
T08D4147:247a-22: n+ya gro dha snying sul nas 'ug pa sna tshogs h'um sgrogs 'jigs pa'i dur khrod phyin //
T08D4147:247a-23: ce sbyang kha ni mer bcas brlang ba'i sgra dag sgrogs pas 'jigs pa dang //
T08D4147:247a-24: la lar thod pa dkar po'i dra bas khyab cing bgrod dka' dang //
T08D4147:247a-25: srin bu rigs kyi tshigs kyis gzengs shing rna khung bskyod pa dang //
T08D4147:247a-26: bung ba sbrang bu brgya phrag mang po rol 'phungs shing 'du //
T08D4147:247a-27: rus pa dkar dang dmar rlon rlung gis bskyod par gyur ba dang //
T08D4147:247a-28: ro bsregs me gsal 'phro dang shing skam rtsa na sprul nyal dang //
T08D4147:247a-29: la lar mi yi lus ni mdung rnos phug nas
T08D4147:247a-30: bskyon pa dag / gshin rje rtag tu dga' ston
T08D4147:247a-32: la lar mi mgo'i thod pa'i gseb nas khrag dang chu ser 'dzags pa yi //
T08D4147:247a-33: khu ba mi sdug dag la sred pa'i sha za'i tshogs kyis khyab //
T08D4147:247b-0: la lar cil cil zer ba'i ro @247b bsreg me yis bskor ba dang //
T08D4147:247b-1: mi ro'i khong nas rgyu long phyung ba gtor bas khyab par gyur //
T08D4147:247b-2: skyo bas brlan pa'i sems kyis ni //
T08D4147:247b-3: der ni bud med der brtags nas //
T08D4147:247b-5: ngo bo nyid ni sems par gyur //
T08D4147:247b-6: skra yi snying ni rdul gyis rtsub cing dmar //
T08D4147:247b-7: mig sbubs bya yi mchu dang sder mos brus //
T08D4147:247b-8: gsang gnas 'gyur zhing mi sdug rnag bcas par //
T08D4147:247b-9: bor ba'i bud med lus der rab tu bltas //
T08D4147:247b-10: dam pa'i spyod pa thang cig gnyer g-yos shing //
T08D4147:247b-11: autpal 'dab ltar dkyus ring mig gis ni //
T08D4147:247b-12: ro yi gzeb de mngon par bltas nas kyang //
T08D4147:247b-13: tshig mang rnam pa du ma smras par gyur //
T08D4147:247b-14: 'di nyid rdo thal byugs pas dga' ba'i gnas khang ni //
T08D4147:247b-15: zla zer gsal bas spras par byas pa ru //
T08D4147:247b-16: sdug pa'i phong bar brten zhing gnas pa las //
T08D4147:247b-17: de ni sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi la nyal //
T08D4147:247b-18: sdug pa'i lag pa'i gzeb tu nyal ba na //
T08D4147:247b-19: 'brug sgra sgrogs pa yis ni khyod skrag na //
T08D4147:247b-20: mer bcas ltas ngan ce sbyang sgra yis ni //
T08D4147:247b-21: dka' thub ma khyod ci phyir 'dir mi 'jigs //
T08D4147:247b-22: 'di nyid rang gi khyim 'khor zla zer de //
T08D4147:247b-23: ro smad lci ba'i khur gyis dal 'gro la //
T08D4147:247b-24: rol cing dgod la sgeg par rnam lta ba //
T08D4147:247b-25: brtse med bya rnams da ltar za bar byed //
T08D4147:247b-26: 'gro ba 'di dag ngan cing mi brtan te //
T08D4147:247b-27: snying rje med pa'i sdug des ci yi phyir //
T08D4147:247b-28: mi ro brgya yis khyab par gyur pa yi //
T08D4147:247b-29: dur khrod 'di ru khyod ni bor bar 'gyur //
T08D4147:247b-30: rang mi rtsa lag mdza' bshes sdug pa dang //
T08D4147:247b-31: padmar bung ba bzhin du gnas pa las //
T08D4147:247b-32: ci phyir mtshan mos rgyu bas 'jigs kyang ni //
T08D4147:247b-33: nyon mongs deng 'dir dur khrod dag tu dga' //
T08D4147:247b-34: sngon ni mdzes shing snum la dkyus ring 'jam pa'i mig gis lta ba na //
T08D4147:247b-35: chags can rnams kyis mig 'bras mtha' dmar 'gyur zhing mi rnams nyams byed pa //
T08D4147:247b-36: 'dod lha'i ri dags rgyar gyur bud med de nyid deng ni bya rnams kyis //
T08D4147:247b-37: mig phyung sdug bsngal byas pas chags dang bcas rnams shin tu 'jigs par byed //
T08D4147:247b-38: mi gtsang sna tshogs khong na mi mngon srog shing
T08D4147:247b-39: gi / lus la bdag gir chags pas lor ba'i
T08D4147:248a-1: mchog 'di 'dod chags ldan pa rnams la ni //
T08D4147:248a-2: brkam pa'i bya yis mchus btog gdong gis nye bar dgod //
T08D4147:248a-3: pi wang gling bu'i sgra snyan rnams dang snyan pa'i glu gar dang bcas pas //
T08D4147:248a-4: mchog tu sdug pa'i pang na bag phab bde bar gnyid log pa'i //
T08D4147:248a-5: bud med de ni ce spyang skad 'byin mu cor sgra bcas shing //
T08D4147:248a-6: sa rdul gyis khyab rtsub pa'i dur khrod 'dir deng nyal bar gyur //
T08D4147:248a-7: gang du rnam par brtags kyang sgra yi rtse mo tsam gyis ni //
T08D4147:248a-8: btsang ba mi gtsang tshogs kyis tshang tshir 'dir mi snad //
T08D4147:248a-9: phung khrol ches can nad mang 'dod pa thang chad la //
T08D4147:248a-10: rang bzhin ngan rnams ci phyir de ni chags par gyur //
T08D4147:248a-11: bu mo 'gro ba kun gyi tshul yang 'di 'dra bas //
T08D4147:248a-12: rmi lam mig 'phrul chu zla lta bur rang bzhin gyis //
T08D4147:248a-13: g-yo ba rtogs pa ji srid srog ni lhag ma dang //
T08D4147:248a-14: bcas shing lus gzhon gyur tshe chags dang nyer bral byos //
T08D4147:248a-15: gshin rje'i chu srin dga' ba'i khar ni chud gyur cing //
T08D4147:248a-16: skra dkar tshogs kyis spyi nas bzung nas ni //
T08D4147:248a-17: srog mthar gyur pa'i gnod pa'i tsher ma'i gnad phug la //
T08D4147:248a-18: mchi mas mig khebs gyur tshe dge ba ji ltar bya //
T08D4147:248a-19: 'jig rten pha rol mi bzad mun nag g-yang chen du //
T08D4147:248a-20: ltung zhing lus byer gyur tshe dge ba 'dod gyur pa //
T08D4147:248a-21: dug can sbrul kha dog pa'i nang du chud gyur pa'i //
T08D4147:248a-22: sbal pa nga ro 'don dang mtshungs zhes mkhas rnams smra //
T08D4147:248a-23: ci phyir tshig rtsub phra ma ma 'brel spyi rtol smra ba dang //
T08D4147:248a-24: snyan tshig bcos mas 'jig rten bslus par gyur nas di ring ni //
T08D4147:248a-25: mi smra gnas zhes spyod pa lta bus mdun so'i phrag nas ni //
T08D4147:248a-26: bya rnams tsham tshom med par mchu yi skam pas lce yang 'byin par gyur //
T08D4147:248a-27: chags pas mdongs shing log pa'i yul goms yon pa'i bsam pa can //
T08D4147:248a-28: byis pa gang gis mig gi yul mthong bstan pa rnam 'jig pa'i //
T08D4147:248a-29: mdzes pa'i ro smad de ni de ring 'jigs dang bral ba yi //
T08D4147:248a-30: mi bzad bya rgod mchu dang sder mor 'jog cing tshul du 'dri //
T08D4147:248a-31: gang dag rang gi khang bas gzhi me tog sel mas gtor ba yi //
T08D4147:248a-32: rtsig pa'i ri mo yongs 'gyur bzhin dang zur gyis lta byed cing //
T08D4147:248a-33: sdug pa'i lag pa'i padmar brten zhing dal gyis 'gro ba yi //
T08D4147:248a-34: bud med de yi rkang pa de ni wa dag za bar 'gyur //
T08D4147:248b-0: @248b 'di ltar ltan cig skyes pa'i mi sdug mi gtsang 'dam rdzab dang //
T08D4147:248b-1: dregs pas myos shing sems lhung gyur pas sdug bsngal nyon mongs pa'i //
T08D4147:248b-2: lus la khyed kyis 'di ni rang bzhin ma zhir bltas nas ni //
T08D4147:248b-3: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten glog ltar rab tu 'jig la'ang yid byung gis //
T08D4147:248b-4: yang dag ji bzhin thugs chud chos kyi rgyal pos sems can rnams //
T08D4147:248b-5: nyon mongs rma nang rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag pas gdung ba la //
T08D4147:248b-6: rang bzhin bsil ba'i chos gsung chu yi bum pas tshim mdzad pa //
T08D4147:248b-7: sman pa'i mchog gyur ston pa de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T08D4147:248b-8: shes par dka' zhing g-yon can ma zhi las dang nyon mongs ldan //
T08D4147:248b-9: rnam par 'gyur la ma zhi skye bar bshad pa gang yin pas //
T08D4147:248b-10: rmongs pa shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du dbang med 'khor //
T08D4147:248b-11: 'jig rten mi bzad phongs pa'i rdo rjes lus ni nges 'joms 'gyur //
T08D4147:248b-12: gzhon nu'i tshe nam yis lan bur ldan ba'i skra byas shing //
T08D4147:248b-13: gang la lang tsho mdzes pa'i nor bu'i phreng ba mchog bcings dang //
T08D4147:248b-14: bram zes me tog bcas pa'i zhi ba'i chu thigs kyis gtor ba'i //
T08D4147:248b-15: bud med mgo la mi bzad khva rnams thogs pas nyon mongs so //
T08D4147:248b-16: gang zhig bag ma'i dus su me tog bzang bsgos shing //
T08D4147:248b-17: ma yi lag pas dge mtshan bkra shis byas gyur pa'i //
T08D4147:248b-18: skra de di ring rab drag rlung gis bskyod nas ni //
T08D4147:248b-19: dur khrod dag gi shing la rnga yab nyid du gyur //
T08D4147:248b-20: rang bzhin sgrin bar lta dang zur gyis lta gang song //
T08D4147:248b-21: sgeg pa'i goms stabs dang ni dregs myos gang du song //
T08D4147:248b-22: dga' bas steg cing glu dang dgod pa gang du song //
T08D4147:248b-23: ae ma sgyu ma'i gsang ba'i rab bkod ngo mtshar che //
T08D4147:248b-24: dgod cing dal gyis rnam g-yo'i rna rgyan 'od kyis mkhur ba dmar po dang //
T08D4147:248b-25: gang du srog dang mnyam pa'i mdzes pa'i ri mo 'bad de bris pa dang //
T08D4147:248b-26: padma gzhon nu'i snying po lta bu 'jam pa'i mkhur tshos gang yin der //
T08D4147:248b-27: bya rnams dpral bar gnas shing khrag gis spags pa'i mchu yis 'tshog par byed //
T08D4147:248b-28: 'od can mu tig phreng ba'i lbu ba dkar zhing ba spu'i chu bal can //
T08D4147:248b-29: nu ma rgyas pa'i ngur pa zung ldan brang gi
T08D4147:249a-0: rdzing mchog yangs pa dag / g-yo ba'i @249a *
T08D4147:249a-1: // gos lhung byas pas phongs pa'i mig ni gang du chags gyur pa //
T08D4147:249a-2: der ni rnam par rangs pas sbrang bu'i tshogs rnams 'phungs par gyur //
T08D4147:249a-3: sngon ni tsan dan chu thigs phreng gtong ta la'i lo ma rlung yab dang //
T08D4147:249a-4: mngag gzhug rnams dang bzang mo'i gdu bu'i sgrar ldan pa dag g-yog byed cing //
T08D4147:249a-5: khang bzangs zla zer gyis spras dkar bas mdzes pa'i sngas ni rten gyur pa //
T08D4147:249a-6: de ni deng 'dir khva yi sgro gshog rtsub bas bskyod pa'i rlung gis g-yo ba par gyur //
T08D4147:249a-7: gang gis sngon ni 'di bskyod cing //
T08D4147:249a-8: gseb nang dag tu gnas bcas nas //
T08D4147:249a-9: lus kyi shing ni spangs nas ni //
T08D4147:249a-10: sems kyi spre'u de gang du song //
T08D4147:249a-11: gang gis byed pa med 'di yang //
T08D4147:249a-12: byed pa lta bur ston byed pa //
T08D4147:249a-13: bdag med ro 'di spangs nas su //
T08D4147:249a-14: sems kyi bzhad gad mkhan gang song //
T08D4147:249a-15: gang zhig rmongs las blo mdongs pas //
T08D4147:249a-16: nang na bdag tu 'dogs gyur cing //
T08D4147:249a-17: mu stegs can rnams rmongs byed pa'i //
T08D4147:249a-18: rnam shes srin po de gang song //
T08D4147:249a-19: gang gis yun ring rnam rmongs kyang //
T08D4147:249a-20: yang dag par ni mi gnas pas //
T08D4147:249a-21: sna tshogs sems kyi sgyu ma mkhan //
T08D4147:249a-23: bdag gi 'gro ba ser skya sogs //
T08D4147:249a-24: dka' thub pas kyang mi shes pas //
T08D4147:249a-25: nam mkha'i yul gyi spyod yul can //
T08D4147:249a-26: sems kyi rig 'dzin de gang song //
T08D4147:249a-27: g-yo dang mi g-yo'i sgo dgu po //
T08D4147:249a-28: mi gtsang 'di ni spyod spyod pa //
T08D4147:249a-29: de nas lus kyi gzeb 'di las //
T08D4147:249a-30: sems kyi bya de gang du song //
T08D4147:249a-31: mi bzad sul las sdug bsngal 'bab pa'i lan tshva chen pos rab tu khengs gyur pa'i //
T08D4147:249a-32: srid pa'i rgya mtsho nyon mongs sbrul dang nyar 'gre gang yin der chud cing //
T08D4147:249a-33: mi shes chu srin 'khrugs pa'i chu rlabs g-yo ba'i chu bor nub gyur pa //
T08D4147:249a-34: sems kyi mtshan mo spyod pa lus 'di spangs nas di ring gang du song //
T08D4147:249a-35: nyes bral bcom ldan de ni gdul pa'i thabs rnams gang dag yin mkhyen gyi //
T08D4147:249a-36: ma dul gang gis mthar ni dmyal bar me 'bar 'phro bar gyur pa yi //
T08D4147:249a-37: gser ltar ser ba'i gseb tu dbang med par ni 'dor byed pa //
T08D4147:249a-38: rang bzhin g-yo bar byed pa'i sems kyi rta de di ring gang du song //
T08D4147:249b-0: de nas rdo rje'i 'od kyis @249b 'khrig ma rgyas ljang ba //
T08D4147:249b-1: brgya byin dga' bas mig gdangs dul bcas nyer song ste //
T08D4147:249b-2: bu mo rnams la rang bzhin skal bzang tshig gis ni //
T08D4147:249b-3: rjes su mthun zhing dge bas legs so legs zhes smras //
T08D4147:249b-4: sring mo na tshod gzhon zhing 'dod lha'i gnas gyur dang //
T08D4147:249b-5: rgyal rigs 'byor pa'i dpal gyi bde ba spangs nas ni //
T08D4147:249b-6: sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyi bka' la zhugs gyur pa //
T08D4147:249b-7: dka' thub 'dis bdag yongs dga' khyed rnams ci 'dod smros //
T08D4147:249b-8: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug lag mthil gnas bzhin shes par gyis //
T08D4147:249b-9: sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po'i bde ba'ang des rtogs la //
T08D4147:249b-10: lha rgyal brgya byin bdag yin khyed nyid gang 'dod dang //
T08D4147:249b-11: sring mo bdag gis nges par gang bya myur du smros //
T08D4147:249b-12: de nas gzhon nu de rnams yul gyi bde la 'dod med cing //
T08D4147:249b-13: rang bzhin g-yo med sems kyis brgya byin zur mig gis bltas nas //
T08D4147:249b-14: rang gi dge ba yongs smin brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T08D4147:249b-15: kha na ma tho med gsal sna tshogs don ldan tshig 'di smras //
T08D4147:249b-16: brgya byin bdag cag skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ni gdungs gyur pa'i //
T08D4147:249b-17: srid pa'i bde ba'i zil pa'i kha chu 'dzag pa'i rgyu 'dra'i phyir //
T08D4147:249b-18: bzhin ras mdzes pa mya ngan mchi mas bris shing rnyogs pa yi //
T08D4147:249b-19: gnyen rnams spangs nas dka' thub 'di la rjes su zhugs pa min //
T08D4147:249b-20: gzhan yang 'gro ba ma lus tshul ngan gyis bcings mi bzad pa //
T08D4147:249b-21: phongs pa brgya phrag stong gis bcom pas nges par skyo gyur cing //
T08D4147:249b-22: bkren pas nyam thag mthong bas nyes zad rnams kyis rjes 'brangs te //
T08D4147:249b-23: rga med mya ngan med pa'i go 'phang thob phyir brtson pa yin //
T08D4147:249b-24: gal te 'gro la rjes brtse lhag bsam ngang tshul ldan gyur cing //
T08D4147:249b-25: ci ste brgya byin khyod kyis mchog ni yang dag ster nus na //
T08D4147:249b-26: 'chi med mi phrogs tshangs bzhi tshangs pa'i go 'phang rnam grol te //
T08D4147:249b-27: srid pa'i 'jigs pas yongs gdungs bdag cag rnams kyis thob par mdzod //
T08D4147:249b-28: lus las byung zhing 'dzag pa'i dri ma skyon gyis bsgos par gnas pa dang //
T08D4147:249b-29: ma yin mngal du mi gtsang 'dam gyi tshogs na yang ma spangs spyod //
T08D4147:250a-0: byung na rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis ni ma go btsir brgyal @250a * //
T08D4147:250a-2: nyon mongs sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i skye ba gcad par mdzod //
T08D4147:250a-3: rga ba'i srin mos skra dkar mche ba dkar po myu gu ldan pa yi //
T08D4147:250a-4: kha gdangs nas ni 'gro la gzhung lugs med par spyi nas 'dzin byed cing //
T08D4147:250a-5: gang 'di mi yi brtson dran blo gros dga' ba'i dpal ni rab 'joms pa /
T08D4147:250a-6: lha yi dbang po khyod kyis gal te nus na de las bskyab par mdzod //
T08D4147:250a-7: dbugs rgod g-yo zhing lto ba sra la pags pa skya zhing rtsub pa dang //
T08D4147:250a-8: longs spyod 'bar ba sna tshogs thob kyang spyod par mi nus stobs med pa //
T08D4147:250a-9: gang gis lus zin 'chi bdag pho nya'i skyes bu nad tshogs rab 'jigs pa //
T08D4147:250a-10: lha dbang khyod ni ci ste mchog sbyin 'dod na de las bdag cag skyobs //
T08D4147:250a-11: mig ni phyir phyogs gyur cing mi g-yo gnad rnams gcod pas sdug bsngal ba //
T08D4147:250a-12: nyon mongs 'khrugs pas rab tu lus bcom 'jigs pas phung po 'gyel ba dang //
T08D4147:250a-13: gnyen rnams mthong bas mchi mas mkhur ba dag dang mchu ni bkrus gyur pa //
T08D4147:250a-14: gang gis zin na rab tu 'jigs 'gyur 'chi ba de las bdag cag srungs //
T08D4147:250a-15: gang gis yid khyab gyur na phyugs bzhin 'gyur zhing mya ngan gyis zin la //
T08D4147:250a-16: bya dang mi bya'i rnam pa blo la mi sems smad pa'i gnas bskyed pa //
T08D4147:250a-17: tha mal bsil ba'i 'thor ba'i rlung gis g-yab kyang lus tshim mi 'gyur ba'i //
T08D4147:250a-18: 'dod chags me chen de ni mchog sbyin khyod kyis nges par zhi bar mdzod //
T08D4147:250a-19: gang gi shugs kyis mig 'gyur g-yo zhing so yis sgros gnon la //
T08D4147:250a-20: skad cig gis kyang mi bzad dmyal ba'i 'bras bu ster byed sdig can ni //
T08D4147:250a-21: dengs pa'i lo ma dang ni chu dag za ba'i thub rnams kyis kyang ma bton pa'i //
T08D4147:250a-22: yid kyi sul gnas khro ba'i sbrul de brgya byin khyod kyis bsal bar mdzod //
T08D4147:250a-23: gang gis mig khebs gyur na blo gros ngan rnams zhi ba'i lam spong zhing //
T08D4147:250a-24: log lta'i dug gis nye bar spags pa'i yid kyis lam gzhan dag la bsten //
T08D4147:250a-25: gang zhig rab rib bsal bas zag pa kun gyi rgyur ni rab gsungs pa //
T08D4147:250a-26: log yid khyim na spyod pa rmongs pa'i mun nag brgya byin khyod kyis sol //
T08D4147:250a-27: brgya byin mchog ni de dag rnams //
T08D4147:250b-0: @250b khyod la bdag cag rnams slong gis //
T08D4147:250b-1: dam bcas don las 'gal ba ni //
T08D4147:250b-2: mkhas pas 'dod par mi byed do //
T08D4147:250b-3: de nas brgya byin gyis de rnams 'dod pa'i yul
T08D4147:250b-4: dag slong bar mi byed cing ltos pa med la
T08D4147:250b-5: gsal zhing mdzes pa'i tshig gis rnam par 'khrul pas
T08D4147:250b-6: ngo mtshar du gyur cing yang dag par dad pas
T08D4147:250b-7: lus kyi spu zing zhes byed de /
T08D4147:250b-9: mi 'byor dngos po slong bar gyur pa ni //
T08D4147:250b-10: 'jig rten dag na bra zhing zhum gyur pas //
T08D4147:250b-11: gang 'di bdag gis sbyin bar nus pa yi //
T08D4147:250b-12: mchog rnams sbyin gyi bu mo khyed kyis smros //
T08D4147:250b-13: de nas bu mo de rnams kyis de'i nang na
T08D4147:250b-14: mi mngon ba'i rgyus rnam par smras pa'i tshig des
T08D4147:250b-15: yang dag par skyo bas nye bar bskyed pa'i khro
T08D4147:250b-16: bas brgya byin la smras pa /
T08D4147:250b-17: ci phyir nye bar 'drid pa'i thabs dang ni //
T08D4147:250b-18: brgya byin mdzes med de dag gang du lhags //
T08D4147:250b-19: bde ba tsam dang mi mkhas blo can nam //
T08D4147:250b-20: mi bsrun pa yi bgrod bya bdag cag min //
T08D4147:250b-21: 'dir ni phyogs rnams rgya cher grags pa'i tshogs ldan pa'i //
T08D4147:250b-22: rgyal po'i rigs su gyur par khyod kyis mi shes sam //
T08D4147:250b-23: gang gis nor gyi snying po nges par bltas nas ni //
T08D4147:250b-24: nor bdag ming yang ji bzhin don dang ldan pa yi //
T08D4147:250b-25: rga bas gzir zhing 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis //
T08D4147:250b-26: dub cing yid 'byung zhum pa'i 'jigs spang phyir //
T08D4147:250b-27: lha yi mgon po gnas skabs 'dir zhugs kyi //
T08D4147:250b-28: dregs pas ma yin byis min mi brtan min //
T08D4147:250b-29: bsod nams byed pa rnams la 'tshe ba'i phyir //
T08D4147:250b-30: gang phyir khyed ko bdag cag sdug bsngal byed //
T08D4147:250b-31: gnyen dang mdza' bshes 'khor gyi sbyor ba yi //
T08D4147:250b-32: dga' bas brgya byin yun ring 'tsho bar gyis //
T08D4147:250b-33: rang byas mgo skal ldan pa'i 'bar ba yi //
T08D4147:250b-34: gang phyir lha yi bdag por khyod gyur des //
T08D4147:250b-35: gzhan gtses rgyu yis lha yi rgyal po yi //
T08D4147:250b-36: dam pa'i phun sum tshogs thob mi 'gyur ro //
T08D4147:250b-37: de nas dbang po chen po des de'i tshig gsal
T08D4147:250b-38: zhing tshig gi don sna tshogs ston pa'i tshig rnams
T08D4147:250b-40: mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur la dad pas bzhin rab tu dang zhing mdzes pa dang /
T08D4147:251a-0: gzhan yang de rnams kyis bsam pa @251a * //
T08D4147:251a-1: sad pa'i phyir shin tu bsti stang dang bcas pa'i tshig gis smras pa /
T08D4147:251a-2: kye ma ma dang 'dra ba'i sring mo dag /'jig rten dka' thub can dag kyang //
T08D4147:251a-3: mgon du bdag ni lta 'dod na //
T08D4147:251a-4: ci phyir 'di ltar mchog ster ba //
T08D4147:251a-5: nga la khyed rnams brtse med 'gyur //
T08D4147:251a-6: de nas bu mo de rnams lhag par yang 'khrugs
T08D4147:251a-7: shing khro ba dang bcas pas brgya byin la smras
T08D4147:251a-8: pa / bde sogs kyis ni bzhin ras la //
T08D4147:251a-9: chags shing 'dzum dang zur mig gis //
T08D4147:251a-10: rnam lta'i gnas ni gzhan yin zhing //
T08D4147:251a-11: sbyin bya'i mchog kyang gzhan yin no //
T08D4147:251a-12: gal te brgya byin khyod kyis ni //
T08D4147:251a-13: mchog rab ster bar nus na ni //
T08D4147:251a-14: yul rnams kyi ni sha za ni //
T08D4147:251a-15: mi srun de las rgyal bar gyis //
T08D4147:251a-16: yang na 'dod pa spang dka' zhing //
T08D4147:251a-17: log pa'i rtog pas chags gyur na //
T08D4147:251a-18: rgyun de nyid la rtag tu gnos //
T08D4147:251a-20: mig stong ldan khyod mi brtan pa'i //
T08D4147:251a-21: 'dod la yid ni chags gyur pa //
T08D4147:251a-22: khyod ni sbyin bya tha dad na //
T08D4147:251a-23: mchog ces pa ni ji ltar smra //
T08D4147:251a-24: ji ltar chu bo 'jigs pa yi //
T08D4147:251a-25: shugs kyis bdas par gyur pa'i mi //
T08D4147:251a-26: gzhan dag bsgral bar bya'o zhes //
T08D4147:251a-27: yongs rtogs byed pa'i rmongs pa'i gnas //
T08D4147:251a-28: skra rnams bregs par gyur nas ni //
T08D4147:251a-29: phyag dar khrod kyi gos 'chang zhing //
T08D4147:251a-30: dgon pa yul du 'dod par ni //
T08D4147:251a-31: nam zhig de ltar 'gyur zhig gu //
T08D4147:251a-32: gnya' shing gang tsam rnam lta zhing //
T08D4147:251a-33: sa yi lhung bzed lag thogs nas //
T08D4147:251a-34: dpyas med khyim nas khyim du ni //
T08D4147:251a-35: nam zhig slong mo spyod par 'gyur //
T08D4147:251a-36: rnyed dang bkur sti chags med cing //
T08D4147:251a-37: nyon mongs tsher ma'i 'dam rdzab dag / sbyor ba byed cing grong khyer gyi //
T08D4147:251a-38: sbyin pa'i gnas su nam zhig 'gyur //
T08D4147:251a-39: rtsva yi tshogs las langs nas ni //
T08D4147:251a-40: ba mos lci ba'i gos dag dang //
T08D4147:251a-41: zas skom ngan ngon tsam gang gis //
T08D4147:251a-42: nam zhig lus la chags med 'gyur //
T08D4147:251a-43: shing drung ne tso ltar ljang ba'i //
T08D4147:251a-44: ngur pa 'jam po'i gos can du //
T08D4147:251a-45: mthong chos bde ba'i dga' ston dang //
T08D4147:251b-0: nam zhig @251b bdag ni nyal bar 'gyur //
T08D4147:251b-2: chu dang rtsva yi zil pa ltar //
T08D4147:251b-3: ltos med yun ring goms pa yi //
T08D4147:251b-4: bde ba chen po nam zhig 'thob //
T08D4147:251b-5: nam zhig chu ngogs sman ljongs su //
T08D4147:251b-8: yang dang yang du lta bar 'gyur //
T08D4147:251b-9: lta ba kun gyi mar gyur pa'i //
T08D4147:251b-11: srid pa'i longs spyod mi 'dod par //
T08D4147:251b-12: bdag ni nam zhig 'gyur zhig gu //
T08D4147:251b-13: rmi lam smig rgyu sgyu ma sprin //
T08D4147:251b-14: dri za'i grong khyer mtshungs par ni //
T08D4147:251b-15: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten dag / nam zhig rtogs par byed par 'gyur //
T08D4147:251b-16: ming po 'di ltar dga' ba yi //
T08D4147:251b-17: re ba'i yid kyis rnam rol pas //
T08D4147:251b-18: zang zing bcas shing g-yo ba yi //
T08D4147:251b-19: mchog de rnams kyis ci zhig bgyi //
T08D4147:251b-20: kye ma mchog rab sbyin par sems gzhan yang //
T08D4147:251b-21: log par rtog pa skad cig tsam 'ga' zhig / lha mgon 'dod pa ngo bo nyid kyis g-yo //
T08D4147:251b-22: g-yang sa chen po mun nag bcas 'dra bas //
T08D4147:251b-23: sems rgya che ba'i dam pas rnam par spangs //
T08D4147:251b-24: mi rigs 'tshe ba kun gyi rgyur gyur cing //
T08D4147:251b-25: 'dod pas mi rnams 'khrul par byed pas na //
T08D4147:251b-26: 'di ni smad bya 'jigs pa chen po ste //
T08D4147:251b-27: mi gtsang bsgos pa'i sbrul nag dag dang mtshungs //
T08D4147:251b-28: gang 'di thog mtha' med nas 'gro ba dang //
T08D4147:251b-29: 'gro bar 'gyur dang gnas pa'i sems can lus //
T08D4147:251b-30: de ni gsod 'joms bstan dang mtshungs pas na //
T08D4147:251b-31: sdig pa'i gzhir gyur 'dod pas ci zhig bya //
T08D4147:251b-32: lha dbang brgya byin 'dod pa'i yul 'di ni //
T08D4147:251b-33: phyag dar khrod 'drar byed 'dra'i ngo bo bas //
T08D4147:251b-34: brdzun par rtog cing rnam smin mi bzad pa'i //
T08D4147:251b-35: 'dod pa yid kyis kyang ni su zhig bstan //
T08D4147:251b-36: bee d'urya sngo ljang skyes pa yi rtsva dang ni //
T08D4147:251b-37: me tog rgyas par gyur pa'i shing gi nags spangs nas //
T08D4147:251b-38: lcags kyu rnon pos spyi bor 'tshog cing 'dri ba dang //
T08D4147:251b-39: glang chen dbang pos khur skyed yul gyis bslus pa yin //
T08D4147:251b-40: mdung rtse lus bskyon grong gi kha yi tshogs rnams kyi //
T08D4147:252a-1: rlung gis rab tu g-yob par byed 'gyur la //
T08D4147:252a-2: mdza' bo rnams kyang g-yo byas mig gis lta byed par //
T08D4147:252a-3: skyes bu 'jigs par 'gyur ba'ang yul gyis brlag pa yin //
T08D4147:252a-4: byis pa log rtog rlung gis rab 'bar 'dod pa yis //
T08D4147:252a-5: rang nyid khang pa bdag nyid kyis ni sreg byed na //
T08D4147:252a-6: smyig ma lo brgya lon pa phan tshun 'dar ba yis //
T08D4147:252a-7: rang nyid kyis ni sreg par byed pa ji bzhin no //
T08D4147:252a-8: brgya byin gzhan yang rnam rgyal khang par gnas nas ni //
T08D4147:252a-9: 'od 'phro nor bu'i dpal gyis dga' ba 'di las ni //
T08D4147:252a-10: me chen rang 'bar 'jigs pa'i mnar med sar phyin pas //
T08D4147:252a-11: gang 'di dug can yul gyi bde ba de ni bde legs min //
T08D4147:252a-12: mtho ris gnas nas 'gro ba ngan pa'i gnas 'jug cing //
T08D4147:252a-13: skad cig gis lhung 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba //
T08D4147:252a-14: gang dag myong 'gyur lha yi 'jig rten mngon dga' ba //
T08D4147:252a-15: sngar myong gyur pa de ni bde ba myong ma yin //
T08D4147:252a-16: gser gyi padma kha khyer ngang pa nyal ba dang //
T08D4147:252a-17: gang 'dir lha yi khang pa rdzing bur grul rgal
T08D4147:252a-18: ba dag /'dod pa'i las kyis slar yang mi ro
T08D4147:252a-19: rul pa yis // gzings pa'i chu bo rab med nang du ltung bar 'gyur //
T08D4147:252a-20: yongs su gyur na dga' bral rmi lam lta bu yi //
T08D4147:252a-21: lha rnams bde la de ni brgya byin su zhig 'dod //
T08D4147:252a-22: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten khros pa'i sbrul gyis me ltar g-yo bar ni //
T08D4147:252a-23: thams cad rtog pas bdag cag thar la gzhol ba gnas //
T08D4147:252a-24: srid 'gro tshang tshing nang na gnas pa'i byis pa rnams //
T08D4147:252a-25: 'di bde yin zhes pa de log par brtags tsam ste //
T08D4147:252a-26: gang 'di srid pa ma lus sdug bsngal kun bskyed ces //
T08D4147:252a-27: yang dag gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
T08D4147:252a-28: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rang bzhin sdug bsngal mang pos g-yengs 'gyur te //
T08D4147:252a-29: gang tshe 'di na bde ba myong ba'ang bya rog ta lar mtshungs //
T08D4147:252a-30: de yang phrad gyur sdug bsngal du mas zil gyis gnon 'gyur te //
T08D4147:252b-0: chu bo'i chu ni rgya mtshor @252b phyin pa dag dang mtshungs //
T08D4147:252b-1: gang phyir bud med lag pa ge sar bcas pa'i padma'i 'dab 'dra dang //
T08D4147:252b-2: gdu bu cung zad khrol ba tsan dan bsil bas bsgos par gyur pa yis //
T08D4147:252b-3: reg cing zangs ltar dmar bcas sor mo zlum pas brtse pas 'khyud par byas pa dang //
T08D4147:252b-4: bsil yab rlung gi rgyan phreng gtor bas khyab par
T08D4147:252b-5: gnyid log gyur pa dag /'jag ma'i rtse mor bcer
T08D4147:252b-6: pa'i lam du thal ba dang 'dres rlung dmar ni
T08D4147:252b-7: // drag pos g-yob cing dub la lci ba'i lus kyi slar yang nyal 'gyur te /
T08D4147:252b-8: de bas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten skad cig thang cig g-yo bar shes gyis la //
T08D4147:252b-9: phongs pa'i 'bras 'byin 'dod pa spongs la tshams pa'i zhi la brten par gyis //
T08D4147:252b-10: de nas bu mo rnams la mig stong ldan //
T08D4147:252b-11: dga' bas lus kyi ba spu ldang 'gyur zhing //
T08D4147:252b-12: brtson la mngon dga'i sems dang lhan cig gis //
T08D4147:252b-13: sum cu rtsa gsum mngon phyogs song bar gyur //
T08D4147:252b-14: de nas bu mo de rnams rab byung nyer son cing //
T08D4147:252b-15: de nyid don la rnam brtag blo mig dgang gyur pas //
T08D4147:252b-16: dregs pa'i chu rlabs g-yo zhing 'jigs par byed pa yi ;
T08D4147:252b-17: / sdug bsngal mtsho chen mtha' med 'khor ba brgal bar gyur //
T08D4147:252b-18: 'gro ba ma rig mdongs pa kun gyi mig gcig pa //
T08D4147:252b-19: rang bzhin 'gro don rnam byed nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi //
T08D4147:252b-20: thub pas sems can rnams la tshul 'di gsungs pas na //
T08D4147:252b-21: sems can rnams kyi srid pa'i tsher ma zad par
T08D4147:252b-22: shog / gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod
